abstract: A battle seems to be brewing in the markets over the fate of the troubled investment bank. Bondholders like the JPMorgan deal, but Bear’s shareholders hope to scuttle it.
snippet: A battle seems to be brewing in the markets over the fate of the troubled investment bank. Bondholders like the JPMorgan deal, but Bear’s shareholders hope to scuttle it.
lead_paragraph: Only days after the fire sale of Bear Stearns stunned Wall Street, a battle seems to be brewing in the markets over the fate of the troubled investment bank and the controversial deal that JPMorgan and federal authorities devised to save it.

headline.main: It’s Bondholders vs. Shareholders in a Race to Buy Bear Stearns Stock
headline.print_headline: Swinging Between Optimism and Dread on Wall Street

abstract: Only days after the fire sale of Bear Stearns stunned Wall Street, a battle seems to be brewing in the markets over the fate of the troubled investment bank and the controversial deal that JPMorgan and federal authorities devised to save it.
lead_paragraph: Only days after the fire sale of Bear Stearns stunned Wall Street, a battle seems to be brewing in the markets over the fate of the troubled investment bank and the controversial deal that JPMorgan and federal authorities devised to save it.

abstract: James Dimon may have solidified his reputation for deal-making savvy with JPMorgan Chase‘s stunning deal for Bear Stearns But his firm may not be putting its checkbook away yet.
lead_paragraph: James Dimon may have solidified his reputation for deal-making savvy with JPMorgan Chase‘s stunning deal for Bear Stearns But his firm may not be putting its checkbook away yet.

headline.main: Is JPMorgan’s Buying Spree Only Beginning?
